evidence.text: Person B: You, however, haven't changed! You're still the most beautiful girl in the whole wide world! I've followed your career, what a success! Wow wow WOW!
Person B: Oh that's for me. Hey! Why don't we go out for a drink some time now that we've "reconnected"?!
Person B: So... I happen to be in town for a couple of days and... I thought maybe we could... ... go out and grab a drink? Or for a walk, or... you know, the little things that make life matter.

Person B: Tonight is perfect!
Person A: Euh...Tonight is fine as well. I can book Luigi's at 8?
